    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomloose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:sodis.de:MELT-04602270.5</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>DE.FWU</catalog>
            <entry>MELT-04602270.5</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="de">Kriegsgedichte und -sprüche von 1914</string>
            <string language="en">Poems and sayings of war in 1914</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Poésies et énonciations de guerre en 1914</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Poemas e provérbios da guerra em 1914</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Poems e detti della guerra in 1914</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ποιήματα και ρητά του πολέμου το 1914</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Poemas y refranes de la guerra en 1914</string>
          </title>
          <language>de</language>
          <description>
            <string language="de">Fragen zu einer Auswahl von Kriegsgedichten und -sprüchen aus dem Jahr 1914. Zitiert aus: Fröhliche Heerfahrt. 600 lustige Aufschriften an Eisenbahnwagen. Erste Sammlung der volkstümlichen Soldatenbücher, Nürnberg 1915.</string>
            <string language="en">Questions on selected poems and sayings of war from 1914. Quoted from: Merry army travel. 600 funny labels on railway coaches. First collection of popular soldier books, Nuremberg in 1915.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">1. Weltkrieg</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Krieg</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Kriegsbegeisterung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Soldat</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Kriegspropaganda</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">1. World war</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">War</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Enthusiasm for war</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Soldier</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">War propaganda</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <aggregationLevel>
            <source>aggregationLevelValues</source>
            <value>1</value>
          </aggregationLevel>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Questions sur les poésies choisies et 
énonciations de guerre de 1914. Cité de : Joyeux voyage 
d'armée. 600 étiquettes drôles sur les entraîneurs 
ferroviaires. Première collection de livres populaires de 
soldat, Nuremberg en 1915.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Perguntas em poemas selecionados e provérbios da
guerra de 1914. Citado de: Curso alegre do exército. 
600 etiquetas engraçadas em ônibus railway. Primeira 
coleção de livros populares do soldado, Nuremberg em 1915.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Domande sui poems selezionati e detti della 
guerra da 1914. Citato da: Corsa allegra dell'esercito. 
600 etichette divertenti sulle vetture ferroviarie. Prima 
accumulazione dei libri popolari del soldato, Norimberga in 1915.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι ερωτήσεις στα επιλεγμένα ποιήματα και τα ρητά του 
πολέμου από 1914, ανέφεραν: Εύθυμο ταξίδι στρατού. 
600 αστείες ετικέτες στα λεωφορεία σιδηροδρόμων. 
Πρώτη συλλογή των δημοφιλών βιβλίων στρατιωτών, Νυρεμβέργη
το 1915.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Preguntas sobre los poemas seleccionados y 
refranes de la guerra a partir de 1914. Cotizado de: Feliz
recorrido del ejército. 600 escrituras de la etiqueta 
divertidas en los coches ferroviarios. Primera colección de 
libros populares del soldado, Nuremberg en 1915.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">1. Guerre mondiale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Guerre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Enthousiasme pour la guerre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Soldat</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Propagande de guerre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">1. Guerra de mundo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Guerra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Entusiasmo para a guerra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Soldado</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Propaganda da guerra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Guerra</string>

          <keyword>

          <keyword>
